palaka ha anushasaka dhuraya bharaganime uthsawayedi me himinama dayaka sabhawa amatha kala itha udwegakari kathawen anathuruwa piyagata pela basayana dayaka sabhawe piris wethata game ahulagath tharunayan pirisak lawa ‘hu’ kiya amuthu pahe sangrahayak kirimata da amathaka kara naha.in anathuruwa akarawita sanghananda himiyan thamage dewani salasuma kriyathmaka karanne wiweka senasanaye piriwenak athi kala yuthu bawata yojanawak gena emin.senasanayata durakathana pahasukam laba ganimatath wahanayak laba ganimatath wu patu aramuna mulika kara ganimin me yojanawa gena bawata danagath dayaka sabhawa meyata wiruddha wu wita me himiyan owun samanga gatumak pawa athi kara gannawa.
